snippet: Gilles Simon secured his first win over Andy Murray in nearly eight years to set up a semifinal with the defending champion Tomas Berdych.
abstract: Giles Simon defeats Andy Murray for first time in nearly eight years at World Tennis Tournament in Rotterdam, and will face defending champion Tomas Berdych in semifinal; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon secured his first win over Andy Murray in nearly eight years to set up a semifinal with the defending champion Tomas Berdych.
